definition[0]: when you have a haircut, someone cuts your hair for you
example[0]: I havenâ€™t had a haircut for months!
definition[1]: the style your hair is cut in
example[1]: Do you like my new haircut?
definition[2]: a small amount off the normal selling price of a bond, share etc
example[2]: Congress forced depositors to take a mandatory 10 to 15% haircut in order to regulate the industry.
definition[3]: a reduction in the budget for a plan, investment etc
example[3]: By year end, the project had been given three haircuts, and the managers began to worry about its final outcome.
